actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-767.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to amend section 7 of the Mineral Leasing Act governing Federal coal lease royalty rates.

summary.text: Amends the Mineral Lands Leasing Act to provide that coal lease royalty payments may be less than the statutory amount for coal with a calorific heating value of less than 7500 Btu/pound as received.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 7 of the Mineral Leasing Act governing Federal coal lease royalty rates.
